jokes.Joke: A bank is a place that will lend you money if you can prove that you don't need it.
jokes.Creator: Bob Hope

jokes.Joke: I thought 'Deep Throat' was a movie about a giraffe.
jokes.Creator: Bob Hope

jokes.Joke: When she started to play, Steinway came down personally and rubbed his name off the piano.
jokes.Creator: Bob Hope

jokes.Joke: Iâ€™ve never seen six hours whiz by so fast. (about Oscars ceremony)
jokes.Creator: Bob Hope

jokes.Joke: Senator McCarthy is going to disclose the names of 2 million Communists. He just got his hands on a Moscow telephone book.
jokes.Creator: Bob Hope

jokes.Joke: As we flew in, they gave us a 21-gun salute. Three of them were ours. (Vietnam war)
jokes.Creator: Bob Hope

jokes.Joke: It just proves one thing: Their German scientists are better than our German scientists. (about Soviet vs USA space race)
jokes.Creator: Bob Hope

jokes.Joke: The country is behind you, 50 percent. (Vietnam war)
jokes.Creator: Bob Hope

jokes.Joke: They were a very well matched pair: He snores and she is deaf.
jokes.Creator: Bob Hope

jokes.Joke: You know you are getting old when the candles cost more than the cake
jokes.Creator: Bob Hope

jokes.Joke: I grew up with six brothers. That`s how I learned to dance waiting for the bathroom
jokes.Creator: Bob Hope

jokes.Joke: I asked my good friend, Arnold Palmer how I could improve my game, he advised me to Cheat!
jokes.Creator: Bob Hope

jokes.Joke: Out here in the Pacific, they have typhoons and hurricanes that blow over 200 miles an hour. We have tornadoes and hurricanes back home, but I don't worry about them. The mortgage on my house is so heavy that nothing could budge it.
jokes.Creator: Bob Hope

jokes.Joke: One sailor told me the pretty nurse on his ward really knows her job. She takes our blood pressure and then deducts twenty points for - white dress - syndrome.
jokes.Creator: Bob Hope

jokes.Joke: The Democrats have an answer to the unemployment problem. They're all running for the presidency
jokes.Creator: Bob Hope

jokes.Joke: It's so cold here in Washington, D.C., that politicians have their hands in their own pockets.
jokes.Creator: Bob Hope

jokes.Joke: Television. That's where movies go when they die.
jokes.Creator: Bob Hope

jokes.Joke: Ronald Reagan is not a typical politician because he doesn't know how to lie, cheat, and steal. He's always had an agent do that.
jokes.Creator: Bob Hope

jokes.Joke: When they asked Jack Benny to do something for the Actor's Orphanage - he shot both his parents and moved in.
jokes.Creator: Bob Hope

jokes.Joke: Bigamy is the only crime where two rites make a wrong.
jokes.Creator: Bob Hope
